author: minfrin
msg: Backport r917675: Use the APR_FOPEN_* constants instead of the
deprecated APR_* constants within the file_io code.

author: minfrin
msg: Enable platform specific support for the opening of a file or
pipe in non blocking module through the APR_FOPEN_NONBLOCK flag.

author: antoine
msg: This is an issue that we have been experiencing in the gump runs on Ubuntu.
